summary: Comprehensive walkthrough documenting the completed adaptive learning platform implementation. Covers the Agentic AI architecture with Planning-Tool Use-Self-Correction-Persistence paradigm, knowledge tracing system for concept-level mastery, adaptive engine for real-time difficulty adjustment, science knowledge graph with misconception detection, and complete UI with landing page, chat interface, and progress tracking. Includes architecture diagrams, feature demonstrations, code examples, and deployment instructions.
